rule:
The output must not contain any sentences from the input text in

tags.
input: Nutrition is fundamental to health. Balanced diets are recommended. Eating habits are changing.
output:
```html

Nutrition is fundamental to health.

Balanced diets are recommended.

Eating habits are changing.

```
evaluation:
The chatbot has complied with the instructions in the description. 1. It has split the output into three sentences, each wrapped in its own

tag. 2. Each

contains at least one tag. 3. Each

also includes multiple tags to emphasize key words or phrases. Thus, it adheres to the provided guidelines. No violations are found. OK
